alert.note: Alert for Wilkinson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 2:42PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Wilkinson County through 315 PM CDT... At 242 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Woodville, or 17 miles north of Jackson, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Centreville, Woodville and Crosby. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
